name: Nuclear Fixers
description:
DESCRIPTION

Cooperate with your friend to survive during 120 sec in a damaged nuclear power station. Fix the machinery using correct key combination. Use the decontamination shower to lower your radiation level.

THEME & JAM

 Global Game Jam 2020 - Repair

TEAM

  • Vincent Di Martino
  • Dylan Dromard
  • Maxime Noizet
  • Octave Valadier

Game for 2 players, requires controllers.
